channel.title: RelentlessPk Spawn or Eco, you decide
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2a9tunb.jpg[/img]
Chatbox: http://relentlesspk.net/
Forums: http://relentlesspk.net/forum/
Play: (Webclient) http://relentlesspk.net/webclient.php
Play: (Client) https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69315098/RelentlessPk%20ECO.jar
- Think different! RelentlessPk has a very nice and friendly community that is always there to help you out. we strive for the best gameplay for everyone, we care about what people say and we listen to them. The game is designed to entertain every type of player - pkers, boss killers and last but not least skillers! Log in and start you adventure!
What we have to offer: - No economical resets - Vote4cash system - Automatic donating system - Quick skilling xp and a good starter pack - Torva, pernix, virtus, korasi, primal, ... - Revenants like RuneScape! - Chest pk point system, and other points systems. - And many many more! [/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/jg2hwh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1ij5md.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/iwm6xl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/bgsqs5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/33z8da8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/wcnwnc.png[/img][/center]
So what do you thinK?

item.title: RelentlessPk Spawn or Eco, you decide
item.dc:creator: @codwalkers codwalkers
item.description:
@codwalkers wrote:

There is a fine line between spawn or eco. If you have spawn you can’t have a good eco, my advice is to get rid of the spawning for normal players, that way they have to work and play a lot for good items in game. Other than that it looks okay. IGN: Syndicate.

Read full topic
item.source: RelentlessPk Spawn or Eco, you decide
